title: Supply Chain Platform Integration
body:
RTS International partners with GT Nexus, a world-class supply chain collaboration platform that can enhance your customer relationships while saving your company time and money. Our partnership with GT Nexus has allowed us to provide an innovative solution that gives our clients access to working capital in a streamlined and simple way.

Visibility and Control

Access to cloud-based technology helps you manage the flow of goods from the initial order point to the final payment due to your company. The platform allows you to monitor each step, making adjustments as necessary in a secure, electronic processing environment. RTS International customizes accounts receivable funding solutions that work seamlessly with the GT Nexus platform, leveraging the flow of data between the buyer and seller.
field_sub_headline: Integrating fast, flexible financial solutions into your payment platform.
author: admin

title: International Trade Finance
body:
Customized Financing for Companies Around the World

RTS Financial offers international factoring solutions through our partner company, RTS International. These customized services are designed to increase working capital for international companies that sell goods to the United States and Canada. We have helped companies all over the world, including Latin America, Europe and Asia. Instead of waiting 30 to 90 days for customer payments, you can turn your company's receivables into immediate working capital with RTS International. We advance as much as 95% of an invoice amount to your company and hold the balance in reserve. Once we collect payment on the invoice from your customer, we return the reserve balance to you. We keep a small fee for assuming the collection risk.
field_sub_headline: Bringing world-class factoring solutions to international and domestic businesses.
author: admin

title: Credit Reports
body:
Where Good Decisions Start

Some carriers find themselves in financial trouble after taking a load from a broker who pays slowly or not at all. The broker credit ratings that we provide for free on the RTS Pro mobile and web application help inform your business decisions and keeps freight brokers accountable.

RTS Pro currently has information on more than 85,000 brokers and shippers in our database. You can use this service to check up on these companies’ payment histories, bond information and other important data. This arms you with critical information when deciding whether or not to work with a new customer or business partner.

Benefits of Broker Credit Ratings on RTS Pro

  • Simple, easy-to-use rating system
  • Current days-to-pay information
  • Ratings on more than 85,000 brokers and shippers
  • Easy tracking of ratings and other information on companies you work with regularly

Credit Data as Easy as A-B-C

The simple but highly accurate letter-grade rating system on RTS Pro helps you immediately identify a company's financial dependability. The reports are updated daily, eliminating the risk of your company working with a business that cannot pay.

Get RTS Pro Today

While RTS Pro is free, you must be a customer of RTS Financial or RTS Carrier Services to use the mobile app or browser. For more information, visit RTS Pro.com today.
field_sub_headline: Equip yourself with information. Use RTS Pro to find freight brokers with strong credit and payment histories.
author: admin

title: Fuel Card Program
body:
About Our Fuel Network

The flexibility and scale of the RTS Carrier Services fuel card program can save your company thousands of dollars a year. In addition to substantial savings at Pilot Flying J stations nationwide, our exclusive RTS Plus network includes discounts at hundreds of additional fuel stops, including Sapp Bros., Casey's and more.

  • Edit view

Save 25¢ per Gallon

Save an average of 25¢ per gallon at over 2,400 fuel stations.

$2,500 Line of Credit

Get as much as $2,500 per truck, per week.

More Than 2,400 Fuel Stations

Find discounts at thousands of fuel stations, including Pilot Flying J, Sapp Bros., Casey's and more.

Pilot Flying J Discounts

Get point-of-sale fuel discounts at more than 750 Pilot Flying J locations nationwide

RTS Pro Mobile App

Use our mobile app to find the lowest fuel prices along your route.

No Annual Fees

There is no fuel card contract and no annual card fees.
field_sub_headline: Big savings at more than 2,000 fuel stations and credit lines of up to $2,500 per truck, per week.
author: admin

title: RTS Pro
body:
Fuel

Find the lowest diesel prices at more than 2,000 fuel centers nationwide.

  • Find fuel discounts at thousands of Pilot Flying J travel centers and independent fuel stations in our RTS Plus network.
  • Search for fuel centers by state, highway, along your route or your current location
  • Access your rewards points and offers from myPilot within RTS Pro
Credit Reports

Get the latest credit and payment data on more than 85,000 brokers and shippers.

  • See current days-to-pay information
  • View scores using a simple, easy-to-understand rating system
  • Use the Favorite feature to track the companies you work with regularly
Factoring

Create and submit invoices from RTS Pro to your factoring account.

  • Easily upload invoice documents from anywhere at any time
  • View your invoice history with uploaded images
  • See your account overview and reporting in RTS Pro web
Freight

Get exclusive access to thousands of available loads.

  • Search for loads by trailer type, date and location 
  • Sort loads by deadhead, price or distance 
  • Find backhauls using our backhaul suggestion feature

RTS Pro Support

To use RTS Pro, you must be an RTS customer. Download the app on your device for free through Google Play or the App Store or visit www.rtspro.com. If you have questions or feedback about RTS Pro, please call (888) 874-7053 or email support@rtspro.com.
field_headline: Make Trucking Easier with RTS Pro
field_sub_headline: RTS Pro is an all-in-one mobile solution for your trucking company, providing quick access to your fuel discounts, factoring services, broker credit ratings and trucking software.
author: admin

title: Trucking Factoring
body:
What Makes Us Different

Our approach to factoring is simple. We attract new customers by offering simple, transparent factoring rates with no hidden fees. Our customers stay with us because of our fast and responsive customer service and our integrity.

  • Edit view

Same-Day Funding

Our representatives work hard to make sure you get paid within 24 hours.

Competitive Advance Rates

Get more of your money with industry-leading advance rates and scalable funding options.

No Hidden Fees

Including no ACH fees and no invoice-uploading fees.

Fuel Card Program

Get substantial savings at over 2,400 locations nationwide and credit lines of up to $2,500 per truck, per week.

Upload Invoices Online

An easy-to-use mobile and web app lets you upload invoices and manage your account online.

Discounts for U.S. Veterans

We proudly support our service members! All new RTS factoring customers who served in the U.S. military are eligible for additional savings.
field_headline: Same-Day Funding and Competitive Advance Rates
field_sub_headline: With our factoring services, you get funding on open invoices within 24 hours and simple, transparent pricing with no hidden fees.
author: admin

title: Factoring Software
body:
Save time, reduce paperwork and get paid faster!

RTS Pro Factoring lets you create invoices, submit purchase documents, access invoice details, check reports and more through your online factoring account. A streamlined web dashboard provides customers with quick access to their accounts receivable balance, cash reserves balance, recent invoices, top debtors, purchase status and additional reporting features. RTS Financial customers can access RTS Pro Factoring by downloading the RTS Pro mobile app from Google Play or the App Store, or visiting www.rtspro.com.

With our factoring services, you get:

  • Same-day funding
  • Easy invoice uploading
  • Bundle option for submitting multiple invoices
  • Online access to manage your account from anywhere at any time
  • An enhanced camera feature for high-quality image scanning and editing capabilities
  • Upgraded reporting features, including access to history, payments, purchases, aging and an invoice search
  • And more

Additional Services Available in RTS Pro include:

  • Fuel: Find the best fuel discounts along your route
  • Freight: Find thousands of available loads and suggested backhauls
  • Credit: Get free credit reports on over 70,000 brokers and shippers
  • Truck Care: Search for tire and maintenance discounts at over 175 Southern Tire Mart, Southern Tire Mart at Pilot Flying J, Boss Shop and Sapp Bros. service centers
  • Trip Management: Assign trips, track loads and communicate directly with dispatchers and drivers

To learn more about RTS Pro call (855) 851-1005.
field_headline: Make Factoring Easier with RTS Pro
field_sub_headline: A web-based platform that allows you to manage your online factoring account from anywhere at any time.
author: admin

title: ProTransport
body:
Software Designed for Trucking Fleets

ProTransport software integrates every aspect of your trucking business into one integrated system. Every function, including safety, dispatch, accounting, reporting, driver communications and factoring, is instantly accessible. In addition to saving time and resources, ProTransport helps you analyze your fleet's performance and make well-informed decisions for future growth.

A User-Friendly Platform

One of ProTransport’s greatest advantages is its simplicity. The software's user-friendly interface and wide range of features makes it easy to understand, allowing you to harness the full potential of the system.

Built for Fleets of Any Size

ProTransport was developed by over-the-road trucking professionals who understand the industry. The software's advanced features focus on different aspects of running a trucking company and can be customized for any client. Built to serve carriers of all sizes, ProTransport delivers the best overall value in today's trucking software market.

Factoring Made Easier

ProTransport’s software is seamlessly integrated with RTS Financial, which allows you to upload invoices and documents to your online factoring account with a single click. This makes the factoring process even faster, saving you valuable time and resources.

The ProTransport Difference

  • More than 15 years serving the trucking industry
  • Competitive, affordable subscription pricing
  • Thousands of dollars in savings on technology and operating expenses
  • Integration with fuel cards, factoring, QuickBooks, ELDs, IFTA and more
  • Mobile app with two-way messaging, trip planning and document uploading
  • Customizable for trucking fleets of any size

Click here for more information about ProTransport, or call (888) 804-8187.
field_sub_headline: Easy-to-use trucking software for all of your daily operating needs.
author: admin

title: Savings Programs
body:
More Ways to Save

As a member of the RTS fuel card program, you receive valuable discounts on fuel, tires, maintenance, lodging, document scanning, tax services and more..

Service and Roadside

Get exclusive discounts on national brand tires, preventative maintenance and more through Pilot Flying J Truck Care.

Transflo ELDs

Save money and address DOT compliance when you purchase Transflo ELD products through pur fuel card program.

Transflo Discounts

Speed up your cash flow and save money with high-quality document scanning.

IFTA Plus Discounts

Save as much as 35% on accurate, reliable fuel tax software.

Lodging Discounts

Save as much as 20% at popular Wyndham hotels nationwide.
field_headline: Save On Maintenance, IFTA , Lodging and More
field_sub_headline: As a member of the RTS fuel card program, you receive valuable discounts on fuel, tires, maintenance and more.
author: wjorgensen

title: Maintenance
body:
Pilot Flying J Truck Care Program

When your truck breaks down on the highway, who do you call? As an RTS Carrier Services member, you have access to emergency roadside assistance from Pilot Flying J Truck Care. You also get exclusive discounts on tires, maintenance and other services through the Truck Care program.

Advantages of Pilot Flying J Truck Care:

  • 24/7 roadside assistance
  • More than 20 service centers nationwide
  • Pilot Flying J Truck Care line of credit
  • Complimentary tire checks
  • Exclusive discounts on select tires
  • TIA and ASE certified technicians
  • Non-commissioned staff
  • Nationwide limited warranty

Find What You Need on RTS Pro

As an RTS Carrier Services customer you have access to RTS Pro, our exclusive mobile and web application that provides solutions to your trucking company's everyday operational needs. Find all Truck Care service center locations, discounts and service listings in RTS Pro, under Service & Roadside.

Don’t have it yet? Download for free in the App Store or Google Play.

To learn more, please call (877) 519-1990.
field_sub_headline: RTS Carrier Services members receive exclusive discounts on national brand tires, preventative maintenance and more through Pilot Flying J Truck Care.
author: wjorgensen

title: ELD Discounts
body:
As a member of RTS Carrier Services, you can save hundreds of dollars by purchasing industry-leading Transflo electronic logging devices (ELDs). These devices address compliance with the new DOT rule that requires most commercial truck drivers to track their hours of service with ELDs.

Save $99 On Each ELD

RTS Carrier Services members can sign up for a two-year ELD contract that waives the equipment fees on Transflo ELDs--a savings of $99 for each device.

Your Choice of Two Products

Transflo offers competitive pricing on two leading ELD systems. Both products will keep your trucks on the road once the ELD mandate takes effect:

Transflo Standard ELD - $25 per month, per device

  • Hours-of-service logging that addresses compliance with the ELD rule
  • IFTA mileage collection and reporting information
  • Driver vehicle inspection reporting for law enforcement (pre- and post-trip)
  • Basic GPS tracking

Transflo Fleet Telematics - $35 per month, per device

Includes everything in the Transflo Standard ELD, plus the following features:
  • Ultra-accurate vehicle diagnostics and data (miles-per-gallon, engine performance, service warnings, etc.)
  • Map-based truck tracking using GPS locations
  • Accident detection and reconstruction capabilities

How to Get Started

  • Click here to complete the Transflo ELD application.
  • A Transflo representative will contact you to handle the ELD contract, payments and other paperwork.
  • Once you return the ACH form, the ELD device will be shipped directly to your mailing address.
  • For installation help and customer support, contact Transflo at (813) 386-2378.

More About ELDs

The federal ELD mandate applies to most, but not all, trucking companies. To learn more about what your company needs to do to comply with the rule, read our free article, "How Will the ELD Mandate Affect Your Business?"
field_sub_headline: Save money and address DOT compliance when you purchase Transflo ELD products through RTS Carrier Services.
author: wjorgensen

title: Document Scanning Discounts
body:
Quicker Scanning Means Quicker Payments

To get paid faster, it helps to scan and submit trip documents as quickly as possible. Our partnership with Transflo provides you with two important tools for speeding up that process. RTS Carrier Services members will receive a 10-cent discount every time they send documents through Transflo Express or through the convenient phone app, Transflo Mobile. RTS Carrier Services members also have access to the drop box network service TripPak Express.

Transflo Express is a document scanning service from Pegasus TransTech that is available at more than 1,000 truck stops, including Pilot Flying J locations. Within a minute, a Transflo Express cashier can scan a driver’s trip documents. The driver can then send the documents electronically. The documents are immediately available for billing and settlements, allowing your company to save time and accelerate cash flow.

Benefits of Transflo Express:

  • Same-day access to delivery documents
  • Faster billing for drivers and carriers
  • Effective way to speed up cash flow
  • Largest truck stop scanning network
  • All documents are saved for 14 days
  • Available 24 hours a day, every day of the year

Transflo Mobile is an on-the-go scanning application that can be used on a driver’s Android or iPhone. The app is free, provides high-quality images and can send multiple documents at the same time. You can download Transflo Mobile at The Google Play Store or the Apple App Store.

Benefits of Transflo Mobile:

  • Ability to scan documents from anywhere
  • Just as fast as Transflo Express
  • Easy to download and use
  • Can scan and send multiple documents at the same time
  • Multiple editing tools ensure quality images
  • No-hassle automated updates
field_headline: Substantial Savings on Transflo Document Scanning
field_sub_headline: Speed up your cash flow and save money with high-quality document scanning.
author: wjorgensen

title: IFTA Plus Discounts
body:
A Fast Way to Prepare Fuel Tax Returns

IFTA Plus is an online program that tracks the miles your trucking fleet drives and the fuel it purchases. Each financial quarter, the software helps you calculate and store your returns. As an RTS Carrier Services member, you will receive a 20% discount on the IFTA Plus rate. When you combine your RTS Carrier Services membership with factoring services provided by our partner company RTS Financial, the total discount is 35%.

Since 2007, IFTA Plus has prepared International Fuel Tax Agreement returns for more than 10,000 companies. IFTA Plus prepares your official state fuel tax return within seconds. All of your IFTA returns, as well as your fuel purchases and miles, can be accessed at any time from your computer.

Why IFTA Plus?

  • Its calculations are accurate and reliable.
  • The software stores all your fuel purchases, miles, and past IFTA returns permanently for future access.
  • Advanced features incorporate your RTS Carrier Services fuel card to automatically import all of your fuel information.

Three Simple Steps

Here is how IFTA Plus generates accurate returns:

  1. The software collects and logs the total number of gallons your company has purchased during a quarter.
  2. You log into the online software and enter your personal data.
  3. Your IFTA returns are completed and ready to print.
field_headline: Save Up to 35% on IFTA Fuel Tax Software
field_sub_headline: Substantial savings on accurate, reliable fuel tax software.
author: wjorgensen

title: Mexican Trucking Factoring
body:
With 35 years of experience dedicated to serving the trucking industry, we have expanded our transportation factoring services beyond the southern border. RTS International, our international factoring brand, now offers same-day funding in pesos to trucking companies with operations throughout Mexico.

  • Same-day funding with no hidden fees
  • Industry-leading advance rates
  • Online account access with easy invoice uploading
  • Bilingual representatives dedicated to your account
  • Outstanding customer service
  • No limit to the amount of funding available
Learn More on rtsinternational.com
field_headline: Factoring for Trucking Companies in Mexico
field_sub_headline: Turn your invoices into cash within 24 hours with RTS International.
author: wjorgensen

title: Bundled Services
body:
RTS and Pilot Company have partnered to offer an exclusive fuel and factoring bundle. Combine your fuel card program, factoring services and additional benefits for bigger savings, optimized operations and faster growth.

Factoring with RTS

When you bundle factoring with fuel, you get same-day funding with no hidden fees at a better factoring rate. You also get access to several additional free benefits, including:

  • Credit data on over 85,000 brokers and shippers
  • Simple load management tool for keeping track of your load, fleet and fuel data
  • Exclusive load board with access to thousands of available loads and backhauls
  • Additional savings available for U.S. military veterans

The Pilot Fuel Network

With our bundled fuel card program, you get access to better fuel discounts across a network of over 750 Pilot Flying J and One9 fueling locations. Additional benefits include:

  • Loyalty rewards program
  • Maintenance and tire discounts
  • Exclusive food and drink offers through myRewards Plus
  • And more!

Why Bundle Fuel and Factoring?

Get the most out of your partnership with RTS when you bundle fuel and factoring. Combining both services gets you access to:

  • Lower factoring rates
  • Bigger discounts on fuel
  • Back-office support and dedicated customer service
  • Credit lines, data tracking and more! Watch our short video to see how bundling can help your business grow
field_headline: Bundle Your Fuel and Factoring for Additional Savings
field_sub_headline: With our fuel and factoring bundle, you can get better fuel savings and lower factoring rates!
author: wjorgensen
